channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - Stewpot: Tales from a Fantasy Tavern
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-stewpot-tales-from-a-fantasy-tavern
Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This second episode features Takuma Okada, creator of *​Stewpot: Tales from a Fantasy Tavern* .
Timecodes: 00:01:21 - Setting Up 00:07:48 - The Challenge 00:14:30 - Playing the Game
You can find their games here: https://noroadhome.itch.io/
